name: Project: Void
description:
You wake up on a cell of a mysterious high-security lab, as a weird creature from another dimension: a Voider. Suddenly, the lights flash and you are free, with the place on ruins. With no other option, you must figure out the situation and escape this nightmare by doing the only thing you are capable of: possessing others.

Available on Brazilian Portuguese and English, requires Mouse & Keyboard.

This game was created on 2018 as a student group project and the playable portion of it was made to represent the game design that would be behind a full game.
